item.title: Jami add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "Colorless green ideas sleep furiously." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Jami add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Jami add a quote by Lisa See
item.description: "I know a lot about women and their suffering, but I still know almost nothing about men." -- Lisa See

item.title: Jami add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jami add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Jami add a quote by Steve Irwin
item.description: "I have a message for my fans. Whatever you want to do in this world, it is achievable. The most important thing that I've found, that perhaps you could use, is be passionate and enthusiastic in the direction that you choose in life, and you'll be a winner." -- Steve Irwin

item.title: Jami add a quote by St. Catherine of Siena
item.description: "Proclaim the truth and do not be silent through fear." -- St. Catherine of Siena

item.title: Jami add a quote by St. Catherine of Siena
item.description: "Be who God meant you to be and you will set the world on fire." -- St. Catherine of Siena

item.title: Jami add a quote by Calvin Coolidge
item.description: "Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent. The slogan Press On! has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race." -- Calvin Coolidge
